text: tavada (nabiyē! yudevvan vana) ovun an minisunṭa vaḍāda (usas vaśayen samānayan tabā namadina) ‘muṣrikvarunṭa vaḍāda (adhika kālayak) paṇa piṭin (jīvat vī) siṭīmehi itāmat āśāvak ættan vaśayen siṭinu niyata vaśayenma oba dakinnehiya! ovungen sǣma kenekuma taman avurudu dahasak jīvat vī siṭiya yutu nevēdæyi kæmati vannāha. (esē adhika kālayak) ohu jīvatva siṭiyat eya dan̆ḍuvamen poḍiyak hō ohuva bērā gænīmaṭa nohækiya. allāh ovun karana dæya itā avadhānayen yutuva balanneku vaśayen siṭinnēya
